page.title: 17REDHEATH
page.content: BUILT IN THE 15th CENTURY,RENOVATED IN 1712,REDHEATH IS A LARGE BRICK MANSION BEARING A CLOCK TOWER ON THE ROOF TOP (INOPERATIONAL OWING TO MISSING CLAPPER).THE ONE FURLONG APPROACH TO THE BUILDING STILL HAS THE DISTINCT AVENUE OF BEECHES FROM OVER 200 YEARS AGO.SITUATED 2 MILES FROM RICKMANSWORTH,IT OCCUPIES ACRES AND DAILY EDUCATES 247 BOYS(+1 GIRL!)FOR A FEE CONTRIBUTED BY PARENTS.POPULARLY KNOWN AS YORK HOUSE,THIS PRIVATE, WELL-EQUIPPED SCHOOL HAS 15 CLASSROOMS ,A SCIENCE/OUT BLOCK,4 SOCCER PITCHES, 2 RUGBY FIELDS,2 CRICKET SQUARES, A RUNNING TRACK AND 3 TENNIS COURTS. PLANS FOR A NEW MUSIC SUITE AND A SWIMMING POOL ARE NOW IN PROGRESS.
